thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Creval has commitments for 150 mln euros on unsold shares in cash call-source

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Creval has commitments for 150 mln euros on unsold shares in cash call-source
text:
MILAN, March 8 (Reuters) - Italyâ€™s Creval has investors lined up to take on 150 million euro in shares left unsold in a 700 million euro ($864 million) cash call that ends on Thursday, a source close to the matter said confirming a press report.
The mid-sized Italian lender launched last month a new share issue attempting to raise eight times its market value to restructure and prepare for a possible merger.
$1 = 0.8098 euros Reporting by Gianluca Semeraro, writing by Valentina Za, editing by Luca Trogni
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
